attributes.action: Stop the closure of London Overground Ticket Offices.
attributes.background:
Arriva Rail London, which runs Transport for London's (TfL) London Overground services, says the proposals are going through a consultation phase.
If the scheme goes ahead, the train company says 65 ticket offices will be shut.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The closure of Overground ticket offices is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
